content: materials required from the online pattern * grey or pink yarn i used lion brand s vanna s choice in pink and silver grey * clover amour 2 5 mm or 2 75 mm crochet hook i used a 2 75 mm hook * bent tip tapestry needle * fiberfill * 6 mm or 9 mm safety eyes i used 9 mm * clovers stitch markers * fabric for lining of ears * white felt for tusks
